1. Can hypospadias be prevented?
There are currently no measures to prevent hypospadias in boys. However, to limit the risk of this birth defect, mothers should proactively take preventive measures during pregnancy such as:
Do not smoke and drink alcohol; Good weight control during pregnancy.; Avoid exposure to polluted environments, lots of dust and cigarette smoke.; Maintain regular prenatal check-ups to screen for diseases in mother and fetus early, thereby providing timely intervention measures.; Adopt a nutritious diet, especially increasing vitamin and folic acid supplementation.
2. Low cost of hypospadias surgery
The cost of hypospadias surgery is not fixed for all cases. Because in addition to the fixed examination fee listed by the hospital according to regulations, patients may have to pay for other related services.
Depending on each patient and condition, treatment costs will vary. Therefore, when noticing any abnormalities when the child urinates, family members should take the child to major medical facilities with a team of experienced doctors for timely and proper consultation and treatment. Limit future health risks.

With the leading modern machinery and equipment system in the country and the region; Operating room meets international standards; Along with a 5-star boarding area and high-class service... From common surgeries to major high-tech surgeries. These include laparoscopic kidney stone surgery, kidney transplant, tumor resection to preserve kidney parenchyma; Radical nephrectomy; Radical prostatectomy; total bladder resection and small bowel cystoplasty; adrenalectomy; shaping urinary tract defects... Hypospadias is a birth defect in a child's penis. This defect causes the urethra, corpus cavernosum, corpus spongiosum, and glans to develop poorly. At this time, the urethral opening can be located anywhere on the penis, even in the scrotum or perineum. Therefore, patients need to have defects detected early, to be diagnosed and treated promptly, to prevent dangerous complications in the future.
